Before you watch this movie you have to understand that it takes place in its own universe, with its own rules. People getting into video game style fights and dropping coins when they die is the norm in the Scott Pilgrim universe, so really if you're a grandpa or don't understand video games or comics you probably won't understand this or enjoy it.

This is an amazing movie, I saw it at the cinema and will be buying the DVD as soon as it comes out.

As others have said if your not the right age with the right background (sega/N64 etc) with an appreciation of 'the old days' of gaming then you probably won't enjoy this.

Calling it a crap movie however.... well thats basically red flagging yourself as being semi-retarded.
Also calling it a kids movie is a joke (I saw reviewers do this) no kid under the age of 18 is likely to even understand the context, let alone appreciate it.
